most_relevant_reviews.name: Buu Chau
most_relevant_reviews.review:
We order a small hotpot, good enough for 2-3 people, it have tons of meat, bones, meat balls, and the soup was actually decent, leaning toward the sweeter side. The downside is the dipping sauce, a little bit sweet and runny, about the chilly oil, which was not spicy and no flavors at all.

The service was good for the price, however, the place is not clean, trashed and bottle all over the place.

most_relevant_reviews.name: JadeLee Mai
most_relevant_reviews.review:
Delicious beef hot pot with lots of food for 4 people to eat large hot pot. We went a bit late but seeing there were still customers, we stopped by to ask if they were still for sale. The older waitress said yes and when we ordered the hot pot, she brought it out and was very happy with us. .
The other male employee asked for water but didn't even want to answer, which was very rude. We also knew that we should eat quickly and leave quickly without asking for anything else.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Hien Nguyen
most_relevant_reviews.review:
Easy to find location, street frontage, parking opposite 5k
Space: the restaurant is expanded to include the house next door and makes it more airy upstairs
The restaurant is quite crowded at around 7am. Every time I go out to eat, I can't finish it all and have to take it home. 3 people order 1 small hotpot and they are very full. The restaurant sells without having to discuss the quality, the food is quite abundant, the pieces cut into large and thick pieces are delicious, and the seasoning is just right. Crispy fried beef intestines are literally very crispy.
The small hot pot costs 270k, the portion I eat has encrusted meat, balls, and entrails. If you don't eat entrails, you can replace it with sausage.

newest_reviews.name: Ly Minh
newest_reviews.review:
Summary for everyone about Lau restaurant as well as my experience (for young people who want to try it out)
The restaurant's space is cramped and dirty
The air is smelly and musty (with cockroaches and mice). There are a few cases of cockroaches and flies in customers' hot pots.ü§¢
The tables and chairs are very old wood, the tables are dirty and don't be cleaned when new guests come in (they are cleaned but not thoroughly, there are still dirty stains on the table top).
The staff first talked about the parking lot attendant's rude, impolite, and poor attitude (the parking lot was smelly, dirty, full of trash)üò∑
The staff has an attitude, jokes around, talks loudly over the customer's voice, orders are late (when they forget the order) üò¨ takes forever to order and no one answers üòê emphasizes on customer service attitude
As for the hot pot, there's nothing special about the broth (sometimes it's too spicy), the beef is too chewy, the beef balls are mushy, the sausage is hard and inedible (for the elderly or children). üò§
The other dishes are also not so delicious.
The toilet is dirty, dirty, smells of cigarettes, and the sink is dirty.
The upstairs has narrow staircases, mold, an unbearable cockroach smell, and the upstairs space is hot and has no air conditioning ü•µ lacking oxygen.
Regarding management, I don't seem to accept opinions and don't see customer feedback, so the quality of the shop is getting worse and worse.‚¨áÔ∏è

newest_reviews.review: The shop doesn't have a parking space. When it rains, the cars parked on the sidelines get wet. Just came to the restaurant but the service experience was very unpleasant

highest_rating_reviews.name: Nh∆∞ Tr·ªãnh
highest_rating_reviews.review:
- The restaurant space is extremely clean and warm, suitable for dining with family.

- The owner is cute.

- Coming to the important part, the hot pot broth is delicious, the beef is soft, even though the vegetables are stuffed inside, there are quite a lot of them, the beef balls are delicious, the meat and sausage are delicious, but a bit chewy for me.

- We went with 4 people but we were full because of the big hot pot (249k). Maybe next time I will learn from my addiction and order a small hot pot so that I can eat other dishes from the experience restaurant. Ung will come back ü•∞

- After that, I came back a few times but it was no longer the same as before, including the food and service attitude. A bit sad and won't come back again üòî

highest_rating_reviews.review: The hot pot restaurant is located right in front of Su Van Hanh street, very easy to find. Downstairs sells beef noodle soup, upstairs sells beef hotpot. - The owner is cute.

- Coming to the important part, the hot pot broth is delicious, the beef is soft, even though the vegetables are stuffed inside, there are quite a lot of them, the beef balls are delicious, the meat and sausage are delicious, but a bit chewy for me.

- We went with 4 people but we were full because of the big hot pot (249k). Maybe next time I will learn from my addiction and order a small hot pot so that I can eat other dishes from the experience restaurant. Ung will come back ü•∞

- After that, I came back a few times but it was no longer the same as before, including the food and service attitude. A bit sad and won't come back again üòî

highest_rating_reviews.review: The hot pot restaurant is located right in front of Su Van Hanh street, very easy to find. Downstairs sells beef noodle soup, upstairs sells beef hotpot. Fragrant and chewy beef balls. The chainsaw is also huge. Overall, I really like the hot pot. Fast and enthusiastic service.

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Ly Minh
lowest_rating_reviews.review:
Summary for everyone about Lau restaurant as well as my experience (for young people who want to try it out)
The restaurant's space is cramped and dirty
The air is smelly and musty (with cockroaches and mice). There are a few cases of cockroaches and flies in customers' hot pots.ü§¢
The tables and chairs are very old wood, the tables are dirty and don't be cleaned when new guests come in (they are cleaned but not thoroughly, there are still dirty stains on the table top).
The staff first talked about the parking lot attendant's rude, impolite, and poor attitude (the parking lot was smelly, dirty, full of trash)üò∑
The staff has an attitude, jokes around, talks loudly over the customer's voice, orders are late (when they forget the order) üò¨ takes forever to order and no one answers üòê emphasizes on customer service attitude
As for the hot pot, there's nothing special about the broth (sometimes it's too spicy), the beef is too chewy, the beef balls are mushy, the sausage is hard and inedible (for the elderly or children). üò§
The other dishes are also not so delicious.
The toilet is dirty, dirty, smells of cigarettes, and the sink is dirty.
The upstairs has narrow staircases, mold, an unbearable cockroach smell, and the upstairs space is hot and has no air conditioning ü•µ lacking oxygen.
Regarding management, I don't seem to accept opinions and don't see customer feedback, so the quality of the shop is getting worse and worse.‚¨áÔ∏è

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Chou Chou
lowest_rating_reviews.review:
The parking lot is on the sidewalk opposite 5k. Beef hot pot has a lot of toppings but the meat is very chewy, nothing special. Compared to the price of 270k, it's quite expensive because the topping is all very large and chewy bones.

You have to pay extra to eat vegetables and noodles, not for the hot pot.

Eat once and won't come back again.

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Mai Thy
lowest_rating_reviews.review: Today, my friends and I came here to eat beef hot pot! When I was charged a parking fee of 5k, I felt it was an omen. The parking lot on the side of the road was a bit open, but I won't visit any place that charges a parking fee. If they include it in the price of the food, I'll probably get scolded. Now the tables are full of customers downstairs, so I'm being led upstairs! Walking up the stairs, what caught my eye was a dead cockroach on the stairs. The stairs were quite dirty. A strong and musty smell entered my nose. When I arrived at the restaurant, I quickly ordered the small beef hot pot. Price 270k, vegetables 25k, noodles 30k, tofu 30k. As I ate, I kept smelling the smell outside the stairs. Business is not good. The hot pot is full of meat, the beef balls and the broth is not very fragrant. If possible, please eat downstairs instead of upstairs! Upstairs the floor is also very dirty, there is no view. After eating, I went down the stairs. If I hadn't held my breath, I would have vomited on the spot. I think the price is also higher than some beef hot pot places I've eaten at but I can't afford to hire service to clean the restaurant and remove odors. The experience was terrible. I won't visit again next time. But the lady at the shop is very enthusiastic and cute.

Just came to the restaurant but the service experience was very unpleasant

Combo Beef Hotpot with shrimp paste soup base (m·∫Øm ru·ªëc) is around 300k-ish, including a platter of beef slice, tendon slice, and beef tripe and intestines, a mixture of morning spinach and sweet mustard greens, and a small plate of rice noodles. The dish is best served sizzling hot, with diluted shrimp paste sauce for dipping. The taste is strong (aware if u dont like vietnamese shrimpy pasty), deep in flavor, a lil smelly.

most_relevant_reviews.review: One of the best B√∫n B√≤ in District 10. It is a bit expensive but worth the price. They are not in Grab / ShopeeFood, yet you can call and they deliver it to you with free shipping within 3 km. Definitely recommended!

most_relevant_reviews.name: Moon Nguyen
most_relevant_reviews.review:
Combo Beef Hotpot with shrimp paste soup base (m·∫Øm ru·ªëc) is around 300k-ish, including a platter of beef slice, tendon slice, and beef tripe and intestines, a mixture of morning spinach and sweet mustard greens, and a small plate of rice noodles. The dish is best served sizzling hot, with diluted shrimp paste sauce for dipping. The taste is strong (aware if u dont like vietnamese shrimpy pasty), deep in flavor, a lil smelly.
The shop itself has downstair and upstair seats (upstair opens after 11am). It's quite packed in space, so if u come during peak hour (7h-ish), pls expect urself to struggle to find a seat here. The shop is quite hot at peak hours bcuz of the crowd (cant run fans at max speed cuz it will blow off the stove)
The staff is nice and attentive, so be patient if they're a bit delay kn delivering ur food. The shop owner is nice too :)

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Ty Ti
lowest_rating_reviews.review: Cramped space. Service is as good as other places. The food experience is also normal compared to other places in the segment. I don't understand why there is a 5 star rating, probably all the family came to rate it. Have eaten here about 2 to 3 times and after the 3rd time have no intention of coming back again. It feels like trying to cram in tables and chairs. The space is very cramped. The food is always very hot, but whether it's delicious or not depends on each person's judgment. For the price, if you want to pay for a noodle dish in the same segment, you should choose another place. Because compared to the raw materials, it doesn't feel fresh. It feels like a push-pull.

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Phuc Phan
lowest_rating_reviews.review:
DO NOT COME TO EAT
Called for a special bowl but it was no different from a normal bowl. When asked about the ingredients, the staff said there were cows like this and that, some had less meat, others had more meat. Shouldn't you weigh it when you sell it??
Eat like you're being deceived

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Hieu Henry
lowest_rating_reviews.review: Delicious food. Just right. Good service, cool and quiet space. I went out to eat beef noodle soup, but when I got home, my friend and I had stomachaches, and I had mild diarrhea. The restaurant is luxurious and ok, but the quality is so poor that it affects customers' health.
